title: Vietnam Seafront Glamour on Cat Ba Island with Infinity Pool, Bar and Spa
description:
Bask in the timeless elegance at this chic seaside Vietnam retreat overlooking emerald waters. This enchanting escape seamlessly blends colonial charm with modern sophistication, featuring an infinity pool and bar with sweeping views of the island’s dramatic coastline. Cat Ba Island is located in northern Vietnam, known for its lush landscapes, pristine beaches and the breathtaking beauty of Lan Ha Bay. 

Savour all-day dining at Indochine Kitchen, indulge in refined Japanese cuisine at Akoya or unwind with handcrafted cocktails at Vitality Bar beside a shimmering pool. Adventure lies just beyond Hôtel Perle d’Orient Cat Ba - MGallery Collection: trek lush trails at Cat Ba National Park, uncover wartime history at Hospital Cave or cruise through the crystal-clear waters of Lan Ha Bay and Ha Long Bay.
